languages.text: "Учитывая необходимость Адептус Арбитес поддерживать союз с вашей династией, маршал может принять такое наказание". {n}Йегер склоняет голову.{/n} "Наглая законница целиком заслужила кару и впредь будет следить за языком".

"Considering the necessity of the Adeptus Arbites maintaining its alliance with your dynasty, the Marshal may well give his assent to such a penalty." {n}Yeager bows her head.{/n} "This insolent lawwoman has fully earned her punishment and will be watching her mouth from now on."
languages.original_text: "Учитывая необходимость Адептус Арбитес поддерживать союз с вашей династией, маршал может принять такое наказание". {n}Йегер склоняет голову.{/n} "Наглая законница целиком заслужила кару и впредь будет следить за языком".

traits.locale_text: "Considering that it is necessary for the Adeptus Arbites to maintain an alliance with your dynasty, the Marshal may well give his assent to such a penalty." {n}Yeager bows her head.{/n} "This insolent lawwoman has fully earned her punishment and will be watching her mouth from now on."

"Considering that it is necessary for the Adeptus Arbites to maintain an alliance with your dynasty, the Marshal may well give his assent to such a penalty." {n}Yeager bows her head.{/n} "This insolent lawwoman has fully earned her punishment and will be watching her mouth from now on."

"Considering the necessity of the Adeptus Arbites maintaining its alliance with your dynasty, the Marshal may well give his assent to such a penalty." {n}Yeager bows her head.{/n} "This insolent lawwoman has fully earned her punishment and will be watching her mouth from now on."

"Considering the necessity of the Adeptus Arbites maintaining its alliance with your dynasty, the Marshal may well give his assent to such a penalty." {n}Yeager bows her head.{/n} "This insolent lawwoman has fully earned her punishment and will be watching her mouth from now on."

"Considering the necessity of the Adeptus Arbites maintaining its alliance with your dynasty, the Marshal may well give his assent to such a penalty." {n}Yeager bows her head.{/n} "This insolent lawwoman has fully earned her punishment and will be watching her mouth from now on."

"Considering the necessity of the Adeptus Arbites maintaining its alliance with your dynasty, the Marshal may well give his assent to such a penalty." {n}Yeager bows her head.{/n} "This insolent lawwoman has fully earned her punishment and will be watching her mouth from now on."

languages.text: "Angesichts der Notwendigkeit, dass das Adeptus Arbites sein Bündnis mit Eurer Dynastie wahrt, könnte der Marschall einer derartigen Strafe durchaus zustimmen." {n}Yeager neigt ihren Kopf.{/n} "Diese überhebliche Gesetzeshüterin hat sich ihre Strafe verdient und wird ab sofort aufpassen, was sie sagt."
languages.original_text: "Considering the necessity of the Adeptus Arbites maintaining its alliance with your dynasty, the Marshal may well give his assent to such a penalty." {n}Yeager bows her head.{/n} "This insolent lawwoman has fully earned her punishment and will be watching her mouth from now on."

traits.locale_text: "Angesichts der Notwendigkeit, dass das Adeptus Arbites sein Bündnis mit Eurer Dynastie wahrt, könnte der Marschall einer derartigen Strafe durchaus zustimmen." {n}Yeager neigt ihren Kopf.{/n} "Diese überhebliche Gesetzeshüterin hat sich ihre Strafe verdient und wird ab sofort aufpassen, was sie sagt."

languages.text: « Étant donné qu'il est nécessaire à l'Adeptus Arbites de préserver son alliance avec votre dynastie, le maréchal pourrait bien approuver une telle pénalité, {n}dit Yeager en baissant la tête.{/n} Cette insolente législatrice a amplement mérité son châtiment et se gardera dorénavant de parler sans réfléchir. »
languages.original_text: "Considering the necessity of the Adeptus Arbites maintaining its alliance with your dynasty, the Marshal may well give his assent to such a penalty." {n}Yeager bows her head.{/n} "This insolent lawwoman has fully earned her punishment and will be watching her mouth from now on."

traits.locale_text: « Étant donné qu'il est nécessaire à l'Adeptus Arbites de préserver son alliance avec votre dynastie, le maréchal pourrait bien approuver une telle pénalité, {n}dit Yeager en baissant la tête.{/n} Cette insolente législatrice a amplement mérité son châtiment et se gardera dorénavant de parler sans réfléchir. »

languages.text: “考虑到帝国法务部与王朝之间联盟的必要性，元帅极有可能同意这样的惩罚。”{n}耶格尔低下了头。{/n}“若是那位傲慢无礼的女法务官真的受到了这样的惩罚，那也是她罪有应得。从现在开始，她说话会更注意些。”
languages.original_text: "Considering the necessity of the Adeptus Arbites maintaining its alliance with your dynasty, the Marshal may well give his assent to such a penalty." {n}Yeager bows her head.{/n} "This insolent lawwoman has fully earned her punishment and will be watching her mouth from now on."

traits.locale_text: “考虑到帝国法务部与王朝之间联盟的必要性，元帅极有可能同意这样的惩罚。”{n}耶格尔低下了头。{/n}“若是那位傲慢无礼的女法务官真的受到了这样的惩罚，那也是她罪有应得。从现在开始，她说话会更注意些。”

languages.text: «Considerando la necesidad del Adeptus Arbites de mantener la alianza con su dinastía, el Mariscal estaría dispuesto a aceptar semejante penalización». {n}Yeager inclina la cabeza.{/n} «Esta agente de la ley insolente se merece el castigo y vigilará su boca desde este instante».
languages.original_text: "Considering the necessity of the Adeptus Arbites maintaining its alliance with your dynasty, the Marshal may well give his assent to such a penalty." {n}Yeager bows her head.{/n} "This insolent lawwoman has fully earned her punishment and will be watching her mouth from now on."

traits.locale_text: «Considerando la necesidad del Adeptus Arbites de mantener la alianza con su dinastía, el Mariscal estaría dispuesto a aceptar semejante penalización». {n}Yeager inclina la cabeza.{/n} «Esta agente de la ley insolente se merece el castigo y vigilará su boca desde este instante».

languages.text: 「高等裁定局があなたの王朝との同盟関係を維持する必要があることを考慮すると、将帥もそのような処罰に同意される可能性が高いと思われます」{n}イェーガーは頭を下げる。{/n}「この尊大な法執行官は当然の罰を受けるに値し、これからは口を慎むことでしょう」
languages.original_text: "Considering the necessity of the Adeptus Arbites maintaining its alliance with your dynasty, the Marshal may well give his assent to such a penalty." {n}Yeager bows her head.{/n} "This insolent lawwoman has fully earned her punishment and will be watching her mouth from now on."

traits.locale_text: 「高等裁定局があなたの王朝との同盟関係を維持する必要があることを考慮すると、将帥もそのような処罰に同意される可能性が高いと思われます」{n}イェーガーは頭を下げる。{/n}「この尊大な法執行官は当然の罰を受けるに値し、これからは口を慎むことでしょう」

languages.text: "Adeptus Arbites'in hanedanlığınızla ittifakını sürdürmesinin gerekliliği göz önüne alındığında... Miralay böyle bir cezaya pekâlâ onay verebilir." {n}Yeager başını eğiyor.{/n} "Bu küstah kanuncu, cezasını tamamen hak etti ve bundan sonra ağzından çıkanı kulağı duyacak."
languages.original_text: "Considering the necessity of the Adeptus Arbites maintaining its alliance with your dynasty, the Marshal may well give his assent to such a penalty." {n}Yeager bows her head.{/n} "This insolent lawwoman has fully earned her punishment and will be watching her mouth from now on."

traits.locale_text: "Adeptus Arbites'in hanedanlığınızla ittifakını sürdürmesinin gerekliliği göz önüne alındığında... Miralay böyle bir cezaya pekâlâ onay verebilir." {n}Yeager başını eğiyor.{/n} "Bu küstah kanuncu, cezasını tamamen hak etti ve bundan sonra ağzından çıkanı kulağı duyacak."
